TextView.android:text:
-> To open navigation drawer swipe from left to right or tap on the top left button which looks like three horizontal lines.

-> When you opened the app for the first time you might you have noticed that app asked you to enter your name,semeter,section.

-> If you entered wrong details by mistake then you can change it by opening 'CHANGE MT DETAILS' option from navigation drawer.

-> After giving your details open the 'HOME' option from navigation drawer to see what is current period and what is next period.

-> To view the timetable of any section open 'TIMETABLE' option from navigation drawer.

-> What if you want to call/email a faculty member but don't know their phone number/email address then open 'FACULTY' option from navigation drawer then select the faculty member and tap on the phone/email icon to call/email them.

-> To know the syllabus/reference books open 'SYLLABUS' option from navigation drawer.

-> To check notifications open 'NOTIFICATION' option from navigation drawer.

-> Do you have suggest/feedback open 'FEEDBACK' option from navigation drawer.
